reviewText:
Signed up for free student 2 day delivery trial. Ordered and received in 3 days. If you are taking JAVA as a college class this is a great way to learn without reading the textbook, takes you step by step and save loads of time. Course uses Eclispe to learn JAVA so this is a 2 for 1 deal for beginners.

Would not work on my XP computer but worked great on my Windows 7 computer guess the XP does not have DVD because it has JBean...

Another reviewer mentioned that you can find this information elsewhere on the internet.  Sure for the newbie, go ahead and be lost in a world of bits of knowledge out there, because it is fairly daunting to learn java from the free resources out there since you just don't know where to start.  I'm almost done with the first series, and I can say that programming in java is explained by this video probably better than most other instructors out there.  I have the online subscription, which allows me to view all of the series and do the practice exercises along with the videos.

This video and it the rest in its series do a fine job of teaching basic Java programming. However, they offer nothing that can't be found in equally well produced videos that can be found on various educational and free video sites.

This product is suppose to be for both Windows and Mac, but all the demonstrations are done in Windows.  If you are using a Mac, I would not use this product.  The dvd will not play on a dvd player, for all the videos are in .mp4 format on the disk.  The instructor, Jason, does do most of the lessons step by step, but he will also skip steps like assuming knowledge of the terminal in Mac OS X or having your program already to start before the lesson begins.  To conclude, I would not suggest this product to anyone.
